Game use to be good in it's prime but has downgraded a lot ever since they became free.
Lots of hackers, toxic community and has the worst matchmaking I've ever seen, silver 4s matching with gold novas? How's that fair.. And on top of that all the high ranking players smurfing in silver making it even hard to get out of it (valve hasn't even remotely tried to control alt account abusing the hell out of the game). 

This game is the type of game that'll change your mood in an instant so prob won't recommend to buy it.
